description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a Settings screen allowing users to customize preferences such as language and view app info.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays app settings such as language selection and app info.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the SettingsScreen.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Creates the header widget with title and subtitle.

methods.name: _buildLanguageSection
methods.description: Creates the language selection section, allowing users to change app language.

methods.name: _buildAboutSection
methods.description: Creates the 'About' section displaying app name, version, and description.
